ygData.subject: I get knocked down but I get up agian....
ygData.msgSnippet: Aquarious, Night Eyes, and Paddle Tail were now promoted from prisoner to slave, if that could be called a promotion. Tarantulas had constructed collars to

Subject: I get knocked down but I get up agian....
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: AOL 5.0 for Windows sub 41
From: JP3884@...

    Aquarious, Night Eyes, and Paddle Tail were now promoted from prisoner to 
slave, if that could be called a promotion. Tarantulas had constructed 
collars to which he could enduce sever pain to the Maximal slaves, thus 
forceing them to do the bidding of the Predacons. At that moment, they were 
mustering around the holding chamber of Megatron. Tarantulas was having that 
roomec cleared for more computer space. The job was very difficult, 
considering that most of the stuff in there was old heavey junk.
    "Damn it....this is rediculous! I cant belive no one has tried to save 
us." Aquarious, the dolphin, complained as he lifted a pile of scrap and 
moved it into the garbage shute.
    Night Eyes, there unofficial leader snaped back at him, "Listen, no one 
even knows we exsist. If anyone is going to save us, its going to be 
ourselfs. And this is the perfect oppertuninty to do it." She said looking 
around showing them that they were alone, except for that weird tube in the 
middle of the room.
    "Shes right. We have to get out of here.....and get these collars off. 
Keep a look out while I try to fine something to pry them off." Paddle tail 
said. He was a smart engineer and would get them off somehow.
    Aquarious looked to see if anyone was coming and then gazed up at the 
tube. It was dark, but what fasinated him was what was hiding inside of it. 
He reached out and touch the control panel. Immedietly, the tube light up and 
inside hung a sleeping Megatron.
    "By the matrix....look!" He cried pointing up at the purple tyrant, just 
as he awoke to the new light inside his internment tube.
    The other gazed up, as well, and were just a s shocked. The Maximals 
gathered around the tube trying to figure out who it was...
    "What the hell are you all stareing at?!?!" Megatron roared in fistration 
as he remembered he had no arms or legs. Then a thought hit him, and he oozed 
out his devilish charm. "Are you prisoners too? These crule Predacons 
captured me as well....and are experimenting on me."
    Night Eyes stepped forward, "Your a prisoner too? Well, I guess it must 
be your lucky day. Were escaping today. We'll take you with us!"
    Megatron smiled. "Raise the tube, and inside that crate you will find my 
limbs. Hurry, before someone comes." He said excited because he just found 
three new idiots to follow him.
    The Maximals did as they were told and freed Megatron. He flexed his 
arms, now that they were attached, and stood tall on his legs. Paddle Tail 
proved correct and freed them from the collars.
    Megatron turned to look down on them. "Before we go, we must get some 
one....Inferno. he is my...um....luitenent. They brain washed him and we must 
free him. Come along and arm yourself. This is going to be tricky." He said 
and then opened up the door to reveal the corridor.
